content: section h repeats or you can just go straight to the final row and bind off row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 131 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 131 sts repeat row 1 and 2 an additional 7 times 138 sts knit one row then bind off using the k1 k2togtbl method or whatever stretchy bind off you are most comfortable doing begin by knitting 1 stitch so you have a starting stitch on your right needle then step 1 k1 step 2 insert your left needle into the front of both stitches on your right needle step 3 knit both stitches together through the back loop k2togtbl repeat steps 1 thru 3 until you only have one stitch on your needle cut your yarn leaving yourself enough of a tail to weave in then pull tail through 6 egap weave in the ends wet/wash lay flat and shape to dry pin blocking isn t necessary if you do decide to pin block though it will open up your lace stitching and you can pin it into the desired shape
